title: 马甲报道
author: DGK2
txt_content: 第3个小号？不知道说些什么，还是欢迎新人，多看看版规...

replies.author: ηοtch
replies.txt_content:
标题: 马甲报道身为一位深水潜水党（自从吾水至7级之后），我表示没事开个id是件灰常有聊的事情。
于是
第三小号上线了{:10_492:}
and then,it's something important
qing yuan liang wo de zhong wen shu ru fa tu ran huai diao le
BBS administrator,Could you save this account?
I don't want to let this account become the air or spend me 1hour for nothing
but whether you save it or not
I'll dive in the deep water,and change to 大号, just like nothing is happening

replies.author: nsezz123
replies.txt_content:
工总司 发表于 2016-6-18 22:59
MCBBS也开始玩神ID了
神id注册完一半马上被删

replies.txt_content: 乃好吖, 这是涡借给别人的第三个号.

replies.txt_content: 乃好吖, 这是涡的第二个号.
